title: S2 Ep50: Helping parents to read with their children
itunes:title: Helping parents to read with their children
description: Language skills for preschoolers help them achieve more when they get to school, but some parents are better than others at helping their kids to develop these skills. Denis Foug√®re and Carlo Barone tell Tim Phillips about a successful experiment in Paris to help less-educated parents spend time reading with their children.
